translated: The Rage: Carrie 2: Hate is an American horror film directed by Katt Shea in 1999; sequel Carrie devil adapted from the novel Carrie by Stephen King.
original: Carrie 2: La Haine est un film d'horreur américain réalisé en 1999 par Katt Shea; suite du film Carrie au bal du diable adapté du roman Carrie de Stephen King.
